name: file-splitter
title: File Splitter
description: Split large files into smaller chunks
content:
Overview

This application splits large files into smaller, manageable chunks. This is useful for transferring large files over networks with size limits, storing files across multiple storage devices, or processing large files in smaller parts.

Features

  • Split files into configurable chunk sizes
  • Preserve original file name in chunk names
  • Display splitting progress and statistics
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Automatic chunk numbering for easy merging

Parameters

  • Input File: Select the file from stash to split
  • Chunk Size: Size of each chunk in megabytes (default: 10 MB)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for chunk files

Output

The application creates numbered chunk files (e.g., filename.part001, filename.part002) in the output directory. These chunks can later be merged back together using the file-merger app.

Use Cases

  • Transfer large files over size-limited connections
  • Split backups for distributed storage
  • Prepare large files for email attachment
  • Process large datasets in smaller parts
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/file_splitter.py" "${inputFile}" -s ${chunkSize} -o "${outputDir}"
